category.name: Column Preferences
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextProductItemColumnsShownPrefWidth
preference.preference_description: Specifies the widths of the columns for the product item properties defined with the PortalDesignContextProductItemColumnsShownPref preference. Valid Values: Any positive integer representing the number of characters that are visible (assuming an average character width). Each value defined in this preference corresponds with a product item property value defined in the PortalDesignContextProductItemColumnsShownPref preference.
